methodology.description: Tasks selected via stratified sampling across 11 benchmarks, covering all SDLC phases. Each task scored for MCP benefit using weighted combination of context complexity, cross-file dependencies, semantic search potential, and task category affinity.

selection_targets.ccb_dibench: 8 (2 per language: python, rust, javascript, csharp)

tasks.selection_rationale: Proportional by repo, prefer most files changed
